definitions.definition: A statement or an idea which is unproven, but is thought to be true; a guess.
definitions.example: I explained it, but it is pure conjecture whether he understood, or not.

definitions.definition: A supposition based upon incomplete evidence; a hypothesis.
definitions.example: The physicist used his conjecture about subatomic particles to design an experiment.

definitions.definition: (philology) A statement likely to be true based on available evidence, but which has not been formally proven.
To guess; to venture an unproven idea.
definitions.example: I do not know if it is true; I am simply conjecturing here.

definitions.definition: To infer on slight evidence; to guess at.
